name: Honey Lemon Glazed Salmon with Spinach Saute
author: Mazola
ingredients: Freshly ground Spice Islands® Black Pepper Adjustable Grinder
½ cup thinly sliced red onions
¼ teaspoon Spice Islands® Crushed Red Pepper
directions: Grate zest from lemon; set aside
Squeeze 1 tablespoon lemon juice into a small bowl
Line a baking sheet with foil; spray foil with cooking spray
Place salmon fillets on baking sheet
Drizzle with half of the honey mixture
Roast salmon for 10 to 12 minutes or until fish is lightly browned and flakes easily
Brush on remaining glaze as needed
For a browner glaze, broil on HIGH the last few minutes of cooking
Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat
Add onions and garlic and saute 3 to 5 minutes
Continue to saute until spinach is wilted and most of the liquid has evaporated
Stir in 1 teaspoon lemon zest, crushed red pepper and salt
Divide spinach evenly on top of salmon fillets; sprinkle with pine nuts
